list.name: repo_id
list.label: Repo
list.query: SELECT repo AS __text, repo AS __value FROM repos ORDER BY repo

panels.title: File Churn Distribution / Week
panels.description: Each point is a (repo, file, week) churn value derived from pre-computed daily file metrics.

targets.rawSql: SELECT toDateTime(toStartOfWeek(m.day)) AS time, sum(m.churn) AS value FROM file_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY time, m.path ORDER BY time ASC

panels.title: Total Churn / Day
panels.description: Sum(churn) over all files per day.

targets.rawSql: SELECT m.day AS time, r.repo AS metric, sum(m.churn) AS value FROM file_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY time, metric ORDER BY time ASC

panels.title: Top Files By Hotspot Score
panels.description: Ranked by Hotspot Score (combination of churn, contributors, and commit frequency).

targets.rawSql: SELECT path AS file, argMax(hotspot_score, computed_at) AS hotspot_score, sum(churn) AS total_churn, max(contributors) AS max_daily_contributors, sum(commits_count) AS total_commits FROM file_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY file ORDER BY hotspot_score DESC LIMIT 50

SELECT toDateTime(toStartOfWeek(m.day)) AS time, (sum(m.churn) / greatest(1, sum(m.contributors))) AS value FROM file_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY time, m.path ORDER BY time ASC
